title: Ep - 95 - INSIDE THE BACHELOR SECRETS
description:
New York travel guide Greg Shapiro gives an inside report from Luann de Lessep’s show at Feinstein’s/54 Below.  


Author Amy Kaufman answers Kate's speed round of questions about The Bachelor including how much money contestants make, if they are bound by contracts post engagement, and the whereabouts of the first Bachelor Alex Michel. 


True crime writer and podcast host Kevin Flynn reviews the season premiere of the newly revamped American Idol. 


Courtney and Mary from Two Judgey Girls discuss with Kate this week's episode of Vanderpump Rules. 


Reality Life with Kate Casey
